content: The most interesting thing around here is just up the small hill past the tower. You'll find a large corpse of some kind at the base of a statue built into the cliffs ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
The most interesting thing around here is just up the small hill past the tower. You'll find a large corpse of some kind at the base of a statue built into the cliffs ahead.
